entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 4:41 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
